A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Luke Skywalker deserved better than what this nonsensical mess did to him.  Snoke deserved better than what this nonsensical mess did to him.  Rey deserved better than what this nonsensical mess did to her.  The audience deserved better than what this nonsensical mess gave it.  Star Wars fans everywhere deserve better than what this nonsensical mess delivers.\n\nDisney ruined every character they touched and this story should be thrown out of Star Wars canon before it finishes its theatrical run.
